subtasks.details: Create a language picker component. Use React state/hooks to manage selected language. Store user language preference in Supabase (user profile table). On app load, fetch and apply the preferred language. Update i18n instance and UI on language change.

subtasks.title: Support RTL Layouts and Directionality
subtasks.description: Detect RTL languages and adjust UI layout direction accordingly.
subtasks.details: Use expo-localization to detect RTL languages. Update app root and relevant components to support RTL layout using React Native's `I18nManager`. Test UI mirroring and ensure all components render correctly in RTL mode.

subtasks.title: Implement Date, Time, and Number Formatting
subtasks.description: Format dates, times, and numbers according to the selected locale using i18n and JavaScript Intl APIs.
subtasks.details: Replace all date, time, and number displays in UI with localized formatting functions. Use `Intl.DateTimeFormat` and `Intl.NumberFormat` or i18n library helpers. Add unit tests to verify correct formatting for each supported locale.

subtasks.title: Translation Management and Supabase Integration
subtasks.description: Design Supabase schema for storing translations and manage translation updates via API.
subtasks.details: Create a `translations` table in Supabase with fields for key, language, and value. Define RLS policies to restrict write access to authorized translators. Implement API endpoints or Supabase functions for fetching and updating translations. Integrate translation fetching into the frontend i18n service.

subtasks.title: Font Scaling and Accessibility
subtasks.description: Ensure all text components support dynamic font scaling and accessibility settings.
subtasks.details: Update text components to use React Native's accessibility props and support dynamic font scaling. Test with different device accessibility settings. Add integration tests to verify font scaling works across languages and layouts.

subtasks.title: Localized Assets Management
subtasks.description: Organize and serve localized images, icons, and other assets based on the selected language/region.
subtasks.details: Structure asset folders by locale. Update asset loading logic in UI components to select assets based on current language/region. Store asset metadata in Supabase if dynamic asset management is required. Test asset switching for all supported locales.

subtasks.title: Localization Workflow and RLS Policies
subtasks.description: Define localization workflow, including translation submission, review, and deployment. Implement Supabase RLS policies for secure translation management.
subtasks.details: Document the translation workflow (e.g., string extraction, translation, review, deployment). Set up Supabase RLS policies to allow only authorized users to submit or edit translations. Add audit fields (created_by, updated_by) to translation tables. Test RLS policies with unit/integration tests.

subtasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
subtasks.description: Develop and run unit and integration tests for all localization features across frontend and backend.
subtasks.details: Write unit tests for translation hooks, formatting utilities, and language selection logic. Create integration tests for end-to-end localization flows (string rendering, language switching, RTL layout, asset loading). Test Supabase API endpoints and RLS policies. Validate fallback and error handling for missing translations.

tasks.title: Implement Continuous Integration and Deployment
tasks.description: Set up CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
tasks.details:
1. Set up GitHub Actions for CI/CD
2. Implement automated unit testing in CI pipeline
3. Set up end-to-end testing using Detox
4. Implement code quality checks (e.g., ESLint, Prettier)
5. Set up automated builds for iOS and Android
6. Implement beta distribution using TestFlight and Google Play Console
7. Set up automated deployment to Expo
8. Implement versioning and changelog generation
9. Set up monitoring and alerting for CI/CD pipeline
10. Implement feature flag system for gradual rollouts
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify CI pipeline triggers on pull requests
2. Test automated unit test execution
3. Verify end-to-end test execution in CI
4. Test code quality check enforcement
5. Verify automated builds for both platforms
6. Test beta distribution process
7. Verify Expo deployment process
8. Test versioning and changelog generation
9. Verify monitoring and alerting functionality
10. Test feature flag system with sample rollout

subtasks.title: Configure CI/CD Pipeline for React Native/Expo and Supabase
subtasks.description: Set up automated workflows using GitHub Actions and EAS for Expo frontend and Supabase backend, including environment variables and secrets management.
subtasks.details: Create .github/workflows for Expo (frontend) and Supabase (backend). Integrate EAS CLI for Expo builds. Ensure secrets (EXPO_TOKEN, SUPABASE_KEY) are securely stored. Reference PRD and RULES.md for required build triggers and branch policies.

subtasks.title: Implement Automated Build and Deployment Workflows
subtasks.description: Automate build and deployment for both frontend (Expo EAS) and backend (Supabase migrations/functions) using CI/CD workflows.
subtasks.details: Configure EAS build jobs for all platforms. Set up deployment triggers on main branch merges. For Supabase, automate migration deployment and function updates. Ensure PR previews for frontend using EAS Hosting.

subtasks.title: Set Up Unit and Integration Testing for Frontend
subtasks.description: Establish unit and integration test suites for React Native components, hooks, and API services.
subtasks.details: Use Jest and React Native Testing Library. Cover UI components, state management (React Hooks), and API service integration (Supabase/OpenAI). Reference PRD for required test cases and RULES.md for coverage thresholds.

subtasks.title: Set Up Unit and Integration Testing for Backend
subtasks.description: Implement unit and integration tests for Supabase functions, triggers, and RLS policies.
subtasks.details: Use Supabase CLI and Postgres test frameworks. Test table schemas, RLS policies, and API endpoints. Ensure tests cover all business logic and security rules as per RULES.md.

subtasks.title: Integrate Code Quality and Linting Checks
subtasks.description: Add automated code quality checks for both frontend and backend in CI/CD workflows.
subtasks.details: Configure ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript checks for React Native. Set up SQL and function linting for Supabase. Fail builds on code quality violations.

subtasks.title: Design and Implement Supabase Table Schemas and RLS Policies
subtasks.description: Define and migrate Supabase table schemas and implement Row Level Security (RLS) policies.
subtasks.details: Create migration scripts for all tables as per PRD. Write RLS policies to enforce access control. Document schema and policies for API integration.

subtasks.title: Develop Feature Flag System (Frontend and Backend)
subtasks.description: Implement a feature flag system to enable/disable features dynamically in both frontend and backend.
subtasks.details: Create Supabase table for feature flags with RLS. Integrate feature flag checks in React Native using hooks and context. Ensure backend respects feature flags in API logic.

subtasks.title: Integrate Monitoring and Error Reporting
subtasks.description: Set up monitoring and error reporting for both frontend and backend.
subtasks.details: Integrate Sentry or similar for React Native error tracking. Enable Supabase logs and alerts for backend. Ensure alerts for failed builds, deployments, and runtime errors.

subtasks.title: Implement Versioning and Beta Distribution
subtasks.description: Automate versioning and beta distribution for the Expo app and Supabase backend.
subtasks.details: Configure semantic versioning in CI. Use EAS Update for beta releases. Manage Supabase migration versions. Distribute beta builds to testers via EAS or TestFlight/Google Play.

subtasks.title: Document CI/CD, Testing, and Deployment Processes
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for all CI/CD, testing, deployment, and feature flag processes.
subtasks.details: Document workflow files, environment setup, test commands, deployment steps, and feature flag usage. Ensure documentation aligns with PRD and RULES.md.

tasks.title: Implement Error Handling and Logging
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive error handling and logging system.
tasks.details:
1. Implement global error boundary in React Native
2. Set up error logging service (e.g., Sentry)
3. Implement custom error types for different scenarios
4. Create user-friendly error messages
5. Implement retry mechanisms for network requests
6. Set up crash reporting
7. Implement logging for critical user actions
8. Create an admin dashboard for error monitoring
9. Implement error alerting system for critical issues
10. Develop a system for categorizing and prioritizing errors
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test error boundary with simulated errors
2. Verify error logging in Sentry
3. Test custom error handling for various scenarios
4. Verify user-friendly error message display
5. Test retry mechanisms for poor network conditions
6. Verify crash reports are properly captured
7. Test logging of critical user actions
8. Verify admin dashboard displays errors correctly
9. Test error alerting system
10. Verify error categorization and prioritization

subtasks.title: Implement Error Boundaries in React Native/Expo Frontend
subtasks.description: Create reusable error boundary components to catch and handle errors in critical UI sections, following best practices for placement and fallback UI.
subtasks.details: Use class components for error boundaries. Wrap independent features (e.g., dashboard, forms) rather than the entire app. Design user-friendly fallback UIs with context-specific messaging and retry options. Integrate with React Hooks for state management where possible. Write unit tests for error boundary behavior.

subtasks.title: Set Up Centralized Logging Service (Frontend & Backend)
subtasks.description: Establish a logging service to capture, store, and forward error and action logs from both the frontend and Supabase backend.
subtasks.details: Integrate a logging library or custom service in React Native. Use Supabase functions or tables to store logs. Ensure logs include error details, user context, and timestamps. Provide API integration for log submission. Write integration tests for log capture and storage.

subtasks.title: Define and Implement Custom Error Types
subtasks.description: Create a set of custom error classes/types for both frontend and backend to enable granular error categorization and handling.
subtasks.details: Define error types (e.g., NetworkError, ValidationError, AuthError) in TypeScript/JavaScript and Supabase (Postgres enums or codes). Ensure error boundaries and logging service recognize and process these types. Add unit tests for error instantiation and propagation.

subtasks.title: Design User Messaging and Fallback UI Components
subtasks.description: Develop UI components for displaying error messages, retry prompts, and user guidance based on error context and type.
subtasks.details: Create modular components for error banners, modals, and inline messages. Use React Hooks for state (e.g., error, retry count). Ensure messages are actionable and context-aware. Write unit tests for UI rendering and state transitions.

subtasks.title: Implement Retry Mechanisms for API and Data Operations
subtasks.description: Add retry logic to API service integrations (Supabase, OpenAI) for transient errors, with exponential backoff and user feedback.
subtasks.details: Wrap API calls with retry logic using custom hooks or utility functions. Expose retry actions in UI components. Log retry attempts and outcomes. Write integration tests for retry flows and edge cases.

subtasks.title: Integrate Crash Reporting Tools and Backend Storage
subtasks.description: Set up crash reporting (e.g., Sentry, custom Supabase table) to capture unhandled exceptions and critical failures from both frontend and backend.
subtasks.details: Configure crash reporting SDK in React Native. Create Supabase table schema for crash reports (fields: error type, stack trace, user/session info, timestamp). Set up RLS policies to restrict access. Write integration tests for crash report submission and retrieval.

subtasks.title: Implement Action Logging for User and System Events
subtasks.description: Log significant user actions and system events for auditability and debugging, storing them in Supabase with appropriate schema and RLS.
subtasks.details: Define action types and payloads. Create Supabase table for action logs (fields: user_id, action_type, metadata, timestamp). Integrate logging in frontend and backend flows. Write unit and integration tests for action logging.

subtasks.title: Develop Admin Dashboard for Error and Log Monitoring
subtasks.description: Build a secure admin dashboard in React Native/Expo to view, filter, and analyze error logs, crash reports, and action logs from Supabase.
subtasks.details: Design UI components for log tables, filters, and detail views. Integrate with Supabase API for data fetching. Implement RLS policies to restrict dashboard access to admins. Write integration tests for dashboard features and access control.

subtasks.title: Set Up Automated Alerting for Critical Errors
subtasks.description: Configure automated alerts (e.g., email, Slack, push notifications) for high-severity errors or crash reports detected in Supabase.
subtasks.details: Use Supabase triggers/functions or external services to send alerts on critical log entries. Define alert thresholds and escalation paths. Test alert delivery and deduplication.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Categorization and Analytics
subtasks.description: Develop logic and UI for categorizing errors (by type, source, frequency) and provide analytics in the admin dashboard.
subtasks.details: Add error category fields to log schemas. Implement backend queries and frontend visualizations (charts, tables) for error trends. Write tests for categorization logic and analytics accuracy.

tasks.title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing and Beta Launch
tasks.description: Prepare for and conduct user acceptance testing, followed by a beta launch.
tasks.details:
1. Develop a comprehensive test plan
2. Recruit beta testers (including from pilot employers)
3. Set up beta testing infrastructure (e.g., TestFlight, Google Play Console)
4. Create user guides and onboarding materials
5. Implement feedback collection mechanism in the app
6. Conduct usability testing sessions
7. Analyze and prioritize feedback and bug reports
8. Make necessary adjustments based on beta feedback
9. Prepare for public beta launch
10. Develop a communication plan for beta launch
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify all features work as expected in beta version
2. Test onboarding process with new users
3. Verify feedback collection mechanism
4. Analyze usability testing results
5. Test critical user journeys end-to-end
6. Verify app stability and performance in real-world use
7. Test data accuracy and consistency
8. Verify privacy and security measures in beta environment
9. Conduct load testing with expected beta user numbers
10. Perform final regression testing before public beta launch

subtasks.title: Develop Comprehensive Test Plan
subtasks.description: Create a detailed test plan covering unit, integration, and end-to-end tests for both the React Native/Expo frontend and Supabase backend.
subtasks.details: Define test cases for UI components (including edge cases), state management using React Hooks, API service integration (Supabase/OpenAI), Supabase table schema, and RLS policies. Specify required tools (e.g., Jest, React Native Testing Library) and coverage targets.

subtasks.title: Recruit and Onboard Beta Testers
subtasks.description: Identify, recruit, and onboard a diverse group of beta testers representing target user personas.
subtasks.details: Prepare onboarding materials, NDA agreements, and access instructions. Ensure testers have devices compatible with Expo builds. Set up a feedback channel (e.g., Slack, Discord, or email).

subtasks.title: Set Up Infrastructure for Beta
subtasks.description: Provision and configure infrastructure for the beta environment, including Expo builds and Supabase backend.
subtasks.details: Deploy Expo app to staging, configure Supabase project, set up table schemas, implement RLS policies, and integrate with OpenAI APIs. Ensure monitoring, logging, and error tracking are enabled.

subtasks.title: Draft and Publish User Guides
subtasks.description: Create user guides and onboarding documentation tailored for beta testers.
subtasks.details: Include step-by-step instructions for app installation (Expo Go or standalone), feature walkthroughs, UI component explanations, and troubleshooting tips. Highlight state management flows and API integration points.

subtasks.title: Implement Feedback Collection Mechanisms
subtasks.description: Integrate feedback collection tools within the app and external channels.
subtasks.details: Add in-app feedback forms (React Native UI components), connect to Supabase for storing feedback, and set up automated notifications for new submissions. Ensure RLS policies protect user data.

subtasks.title: Conduct Usability Testing Sessions
subtasks.description: Organize and facilitate usability testing sessions with beta testers.
subtasks.details: Prepare test scripts focusing on critical UI flows, state transitions, and API interactions. Record sessions (with consent), collect qualitative and quantitative data, and observe pain points.

subtasks.title: Analyze Beta Feedback and Usability Data
subtasks.description: Aggregate and analyze feedback and usability data to identify trends and actionable insights.
subtasks.details: Categorize issues by severity and frequency. Map feedback to specific UI components, state management logic, API endpoints, Supabase schema, and RLS policies. Prioritize fixes and improvements.

subtasks.title: Implement Adjustments and Fixes
subtasks.description: Address prioritized issues and suggestions from beta feedback and usability analysis.
subtasks.details: Update React Native components, refine state management with React Hooks, optimize API service integration, adjust Supabase schema and RLS policies as needed. Write and run new/updated unit and integration tests.

subtasks.title: Prepare for Beta Launch
subtasks.description: Finalize all preparations for the public beta launch.
subtasks.details: Build and distribute the Expo app, verify Supabase backend readiness, ensure all tests pass, and confirm user guides and feedback channels are up-to-date. Perform a final review of RLS policies and data privacy compliance.

subtasks.title: Develop and Execute Communication Plan
subtasks.description: Create and implement a communication plan for beta launch and ongoing updates.
subtasks.details: Draft announcements, update documentation, and schedule regular updates for testers. Set up channels for ongoing support and feedback, and establish protocols for responding to critical issues.
